meanings.definition: The act or process of adopting Western culture or customs.
meanings.sent1: The westernization of their traditional clothing was evident in the use of denim and t-shirts.
meanings.sent2: The country's rapid westernization led to changes in language and fashion.
meanings.sent3: The westernization of the local cuisine resulted in a fusion of flavors that delighted everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her room reflected a blend of eastern and western influences, showcasing the process of westernization.
meanings.sent5: The school's curriculum underwent westernization, incorporating new subjects and teaching methods.

meanings.definition: The influence of Western ideas or practices on a society or culture.
meanings.sent1: The westernization of their traditional music brought in elements of jazz and rock.
meanings.sent2: Globalization has accelerated the process of westernization in many countries.
meanings.sent3: The westernization of the local art scene sparked a creative renaissance.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a perfect example of the subtle influence of westernization on language.
meanings.sent5: The city's architecture showcased a beautiful blend of tradition and westernization.
